labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: discord does not open or focus itself, the notification just disappears.
data.expected_result: Discord should open itself, with focus, and be on the correct message.
data.short_description: Clicking on windows 10 desktop notification does not actually open discord, or bring discord into focus if discord is minimized to tray
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure discord is set to minimize to tray when closed, then "close" discord - Wait for a notification to come through, then click it.
